intension: Promote a sale for an antique camera store with a vintage design. The offer is a 50% discount on 'Your Antique' camera. Encourage customers to visit the store by swiping up.
globalcaption: The image features a black and white photograph of a camera, which appears to be an antique or vintage model. The camera is positioned in the center of the image, with a smaller version of itself placed to the right. The smaller camera is also in black and white, and it is slightly tilted, giving the impression of a diptych composition. The overall scene is focused on the camera, its design, and its historical significance.
keywords: antique, antiques, flea, goods, retro, secondhand, camera, device, photography, sale, discount, illustration, green, instagram, insta, ig, story, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a black and white photograph of a camera, with a star in the upper left corner. The camera is positioned in the center of the image, and it appears to be a vintage or old-fashioned model. The star adds a touch of whimsy to the scene
